title.narrative: IMAGE 2.0 Karnataka

participating-org.narrative: REACH - Rural Environmental Awareness Community Help
SEVAK - Society for Empowerment through Voluntary Action in Karnataka

description.narrative: Expenditure 2021

title.narrative: Adolescent girls vulnerable to early marriage and their families participated in awareness raising activities and get sensitised on consequences of child marriage and on the well being of the early married girls

description.narrative: Adolescent girls vulnerable to early marriage and their families participated in awareness raising activities and get sensitised on consequences of child marriage and on the well being of the early married girls

title.narrative: # of community members with children vulnerable to exploitation participated in awareness raising activities

description.narrative: # of community members with children vulnerable to exploitation participated in awareness raising activities

comment.narrative: The fund utilisation and output indicator achievement is of one location. The team was in enrollment and baseline survey so the plan was shifted to next quarter.;

title.narrative: CSO representatives participated in participated in their network meetings for promotion of child rights

description.narrative: CSO representatives participated in participated in their network meetings for promotion of child rights

title.narrative: # of CSOs participated in networks for promotion of child rights

description.narrative: # of CSOs participated in networks for promotion of child rights

comment.narrative: one network meeting conducted to introduce the project and 38 CSOs participated, which was planned in next quarter in one implementing location. The activity expenses is booked in co-funding budget. There is no budget allocated for this indicator in TdH budget.;

title.narrative: Child protection committee are strengthened with building support of community and family members

description.narrative: Child protection committee are strengthened with building support of community and family members

title.narrative: # of community members participated in child protection committees

description.narrative: # of community members participated in child protection committees

comment.narrative: The fund utilisation and output indicator achievement is of one location. Community members who are part of child protection committees and ensured their participation during house visit by the team, though not planned in one implemented location.;

title.narrative: Children vulnerable to early marriage participate in awareness raising sessions.

description.narrative: # of vulnerable children participated in awareness raising sessions

comment.narrative: The fund utilisation and output indicator achievement is of one location, therefore the achievement is less than the target.;

comment.narrative: No plan made in this activity during the quarter;

title.narrative: Early married girls are safeguarded with health,legal aid through referral and para counselling services

description.narrative: # of girls immediately safeguarded

comment.narrative: The fund utilisation and output indicator achievement is of one location. Thought there is no plan of safeguarding services, 38 EMGs were supported during the quarter in one implemented location.;

comment.narrative: Counselling services provided during house visit and baseline survey process in one implemented location. The activity expenses is booked in co-funding budget. There is no budget allocated for this indicator in TdH budget.;
